member.name: T:C1.WPF.Sparkline.SparklineType
member.summary: Represents the sparkline type.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.SparklineType.Line
member.summary: Specifies the line sparkline.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.SparklineType.Column
member.summary: Specifies the column sparkline.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.SparklineType.Winloss
member.summary: Specifies the winloss sparkline.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.Sparkline.EmptyValueStyle
member.summary: Specifies how to show an empty value from a data series in the chart.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.EmptyValueStyle.Gaps
member.summary: Leaves gaps for empty values in a data series, which results in a segmented line.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.EmptyValueStyle.Zero
member.summary: Handles empty values in a data series as zero values, so that the line drops to zero for zero-value data points.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.EmptyValueStyle.Connect
member.summary: Fills gaps with a connecting element instead of leaving gaps for empty values in a data series.

member.summary: Represents the Sparkline object.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether to display the date axis.

member.summary: Occurs when the sparkline has changed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the sparkline.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.MaxAxisType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the vertical axis maximum is calculated for the sparklines in this sparkline group.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.MaxAxisTypeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.MinAxisType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the vertical axis minimum is calculated for the sparklines in this sparkline group.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.MinAxisTypeProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.LineWeight
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the line weight for each sparkline in the sparkline group, where the line weight is measured in points. The weight must be greater than or equal to zero, and must be less than or equal to 3 (LineSeries only supports line weight values in the range of 0.0->3.0).

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.LineWeightProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.ManualMax
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum for the vertical axis that is shared across all sparklines in this sparkline group. The axis is zero if maxAxisType does not equal custom.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.ManualMaxProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.ManualMin
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the minimum for the vertical axis that is shared across all sparklines in this sparkline group. The axis is zero if minAxisType does not equal custom.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.ManualMinProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.RightToLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether each sparkline in the sparkline group is displayed in a right-to-left manner.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.RightToLeftProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a .

member.name: M:C1.WPF.Sparkline.C1Sparkline.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Builds the visual tree for the control when a new template is applied.
member.remarks: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.

member.name: T:C1.WPF.Sparkline.SparklineAxisMinMax
member.summary: An enumeration that specifies information about how the vertical axis minimum or maximum is computed for this sparkline group.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.SparklineAxisMinMax.Individual
member.summary: Specifies that the vertical axis minimum or maximum for each sparkline in this sparkline group is calculated automatically such that the data point with the minimum or maximum value can be displayed in the plot area.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.SparklineAxisMinMax.Group
member.summary: Specifies that the vertical axis minimum or maximum is shared across all sparklines in this sparkline group and is calculated automatically such that the data point with the minimum or maximum value can be displayed in the plot area.

member.name: F:C1.WPF.Sparkline.SparklineAxisMinMax.Custom
member.summary: Specifies that the vertical axis minimum or maximum for each sparkline in this sparkline group is specified by the manualMin attribute or the manualMax attribute of the sparkline group.
